website_summaries.verdict: An update that retains the classic 1950s style so you can channel your inner Audrey Hepburn.
pros: The original Wayfarer had a tilt that tended to make them slip
These are less angular and smaller, plus they’ll push up onto your head better
Polarized and available in two sizes in multiple frame and lens color combos
cons: A small minority preferred the original Wayfarer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: These are the same Wayfarers I fell in love with at Sunglass Hut but for a fraction of the price. They are 100% authentic from the case, to the quality hardware, logo's, and RB inscription. I'm not sure why these are classified as "men's" since they are the mid-size 55mm. I got the tortoise shell with green lenses. They fit and look great on me, a woman. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: TrainerDi

customer_reviews.title: Polarization Is The Key
customer_reviews.text: Beside looking good and being comfortable, the polarization affect combined with RayBan's normal high quality makes these sunglasses the best I have ever owned. The green tinted lens cut the glare while still allowing you to see inside as well as outside the car. It makes reading the GPS on the cell phone easy while still protecting your eyes from the sun harsh glare.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Look
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels classy. Well worth the price. Nice all around, considering I don't usually drop roughly $200 for non-prescription eyewear, but if you want that classic Ray-Ban look, then this is definitely it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMan

customer_reviews.title: The RB was embedded on the glass, and this ones are engraved,
customer_reviews.text: I just got my sunglasses, they look pretty original, but not a 100% sure. Everything look good, just like the original ones, I just remembered that my previous glasses that I lost. The RB was embedded on the glass, and this ones are engraved, is that the true sign, between an Original and a good copy? (not original) If not original, please I would like exchange for an original or a full refund. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those Audrey Hepburn wannabes
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend was looking for the whole Audrey Hepburn look and these sunglasses nailed it. The attention to detail on these was excellent and I would highly recommend trying these at a local sunglass store to make sure that they are the right fit for you. The only issue that she and I had was fitting the sunglasses but with the help of YouTube we got them to fit her face perfectly. I would recommend the
customer_reviews.author: jrv18

customer_reviews.title: Best Glasses you can Own
customer_reviews.text: Strong hindges that can be bent out of place, yet still corrected. And the polorized lenses help to block the reflection of sun light from water/shiny surfaces. Look great tortoise and I'm glad I didn't get the all black color. Great fit on all shapes of heads (At least that I've come across). Come with a soft-shell case too and ultimately these glasses look great in every single setting
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: It is Ray-Ban and very well made & Genuine Ray-Ban Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: It is Ray-Ban. very well made and stylish. when I first bought it, I was bit skeptical about the genuinity of this Ray-Ban because many buyers left reviews saying that they were fakes. So, after I bought it, I took it to Nordstrom and compared it very thoroughly. they were identically same, including the metal hinge designs, inside of the glasses legs. I got it at $129 from Amazon and Nordstrom was selling it at $190 retail pricing. A great deal from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y. YoonTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've lost so many pairs of Ray Bans I've lost count. I've tried at least one hundred in between but nothing comes close to Ray Bans. Hopefully I'll have this pair for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They came in a Ray Ban box with all the info and serial number on it. Inside the original box was the snap case with a cleaning cloth and the glasses, I used them today in Seattle where is was partly sunny partly cloudy and the color is perfect, not too bright or too dark. Really nice sturdy glasses that look rich :) I have a smaller head/face and they fit perfect and do not look oversized on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Just soapin

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: These are counterfeits. I tried making a warranty claim on them after the broke. Ray-Ban point out to me that they were not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros Nice branded product for the price Neatly packaged and in time shipped Looks authentic/original, has Rayban tags, embossing on the frame/glass Cons We tried RB4171 at SunGlasshut and decided to purchase the same online at Amazon due to cost difference, but the exact match was not available - color and polarized glass. Hence we decided to purchase RB2132 which was kind of similar, but after arrival we found it little small and tortoise frame color was little darker than expected, so the contrast was not that obvious. I guess one has to live with this with online purchases
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: My buddy left these in my truck so I wore them for a few months. Probably the coolest few months of my middle aged life! I walked around like I was Ryan Gosling in these sunglasses! Even my dog looked cool in these sunglasses. Well when it came time to give them back, someone had stole them from me and I had to buy a pair for my friend. Fair price on here and shipping was right on time. Maybe one day someone will get me a pair of these...
customer_reviews.author: Billy Ray Barta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I was worried that their was a chance that I would receive a fake pair. Thankfully I did not! The pair I received was 100 percent real. As always with Ray-Ban's the fit and finish is perfect. The Polarization makes everything less "glare filled". The 55mm lens fits my big head, and after un-boxing them and throwing them on, it cuts through the desert sun like only a good pair of sunglasses can. These glasses came with a lens cleaner, a carrying case, the glasses themselves, and a few pieces of literature to read through. I would high recommend these glasses from this seller to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Howarth

customer_reviews.title: Classic not New
customer_reviews.text: Love these Classic Wayfarer glasses. Definitely not the New Wayfarer. I have a small face and the New Wayfarer do not even come up to the bottom of my eyebrows. I had a pair of each and the New are narrower from the bottom of the lense to the top. These are the real deal despite what the description says and I am so happy they are!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Joan

customer_reviews.title: Lenses have spots where something has worn away after just 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved these glasses when I first got them. They look great on and were wonderful in bright sunlight, driving, everything. However, 6 months later the lenses are a mess! It looks like something is wearing off from the inside of the lens, I see blotchy spots and no amount of cleaning with the cloth that came with them helps. The outside of the lenses are fine. At this cost I expected these to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Redbugxoxo

customer_reviews.title: they look great and feel great
customer_reviews.text: they look great and feel great. i wish that i liked <$100 sunglasses, because thats a fair amount of money for some plastic resin and glass. that being said, the optical quality is high, polarized lenses make everything crisp and clear, and who said fashion was cheap?
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Classy gift
customer_reviews.text: They were on my grandson's wish list. I loved that Amazon sent me a notice about his wish list or I would not have known. I ordered the Ray-ban Wayfarers for his birthday and it was a big hit. "How did I know?" he asked. Ahhh...I love making my grandchildren happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carole C

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of fake Ray Bans!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these from amazon thinking I would avoid the risk of counterfeit Ray Bans. I ordered the Polarized lenses in the 55 size. The Glasses arrived in a box that seemed to indicate the correct size. Inside I found a pair of glasses in the 52 size without polorized lenses. There was no literature or cleaning cloth in the package. Upon further inspection and a little internet research I found that the RB that should be laser etched in the left lens was also missing and the plastic surrounding where the hinge enters the side bow was not finished looking or consistent on both bows. I strongly susupect I recieved a pair of Ray Bans that were not genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: these Sunglasses are awesome! I got the green tint polarized lenses and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always spent no more than twenty bucks for sunglasses, simply because they break in one way or another. I finally decided to take the plunge, these Sunglasses are awesome! I got the green tint polarized lenses and they are great for all things. I would definitely recommend these glasses to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase Love Them
customer_reviews.text: 100% real Rayban, came with lovely saddle colored case and lens cloth. Could not be happier, exactly what I would have purchased for 2x in a retail location. If you are unsure of which to purchase try them on in a store front then order here. I've worn Raybans for years, these look and feel 100% authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Redmeg

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my husband. I wasn't sure of the sizing so I chose the 55mm assuming a larger size wouldn't be an issue for a guy. When they arrived, I found that even I could wear this size (with my small, round face). My husband loved the color and the polarized lenses. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Graphista

customer_reviews.title: Love my RayBans!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure after reading reviews so I shopped around.. My husband ordered one day delivery for my birthday. Got them and they were the real thing. Very pleased with my stylish Ray-Bans and with the service and price. With the one day delivery charge I still got a great deal. I did get them sized at my optician store.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Indestructable!
customer_reviews.text: I am tough on sun glasses - yet I had my last Ray Bans for seven years!!! No scratches! Just love these glasses!
customer_reviews.author: PJMcK

customer_reviews.title: 55mm are large
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great but too large for average size women's face. Unfortunately, I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: So big
customer_reviews.text: They make these shades for ppl with huge heads/faces. :-( had to return
customer_reviews.author: TT Houston

customer_reviews.title: Very small. I bought for my wife and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small. I bought for my wife and she thought it was for kids that is how small it is.
customer_reviews.author: Issa Nur

customer_reviews.title: You really do get cooler when you put them on.
customer_reviews.text: After years of resisting, I finally broke down for some Wayfarers. If I'd done it earlier, maybe my life would be different. They just feel like quality. The tortoise is very dark but still catches the light enough to show some depth. The lenses are dark but indisputably clear.
customer_reviews.author: Rick James

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: They are just the right amount of darkness. I was really hesitant to buy these as I was not trying them on, I intentionally went with the 55mm as I wear my regular glasses larger on my face. My decision was sound and I really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I chose these sunglasses not only for the stylish look, also for the sturdy frames and glass polarized lenses. They are all that the description stated that they would be. I received them in the promised timeframe, well protected by the packaging. I am enjoying wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: lovestoread

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY stylish frames. My wife loves them on me. They're polarized, not so sure about UVA/B. Ray-Ban has made quality glasses for years, and these are no different. I love them for driving in daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RobTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Loose lens!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tortoise colored ones and was so excited to receive them today unless I opened the box and realized the lens doesn't quite fit and you can here it rattle, like it's loose! I hope they stay in there! Anyway, other than that they are perfect. I'm not sure who to contact about this but I plan to contact someone.
customer_reviews.author: RoadRunner85

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised. I absolutely love them! I was a bit worried because I wasn't sure what size (52 or 55) I had tried at Sunglasses Hut. I am so glad I purchased the 55 as they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the gift my husband wanted for Christmas. The product came in perfect mint condition, which I was worried about because of shipping and all. He wears them every day...highly recommend! They are much cheaper through amazon than in stores!!
customer_reviews.author: xoojenoox

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Ray-Ban 2132 New Wayfarer Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. The glasses came exactly as pictured and described with the polarized lenses, and are nicely made.The glasses sold directly from amazon are authentic Ray-Bans. I compared them to my RB2132 Wayfarers that I purchased directly from the Ray-ban website, and they are identical. I have heard many horror stories about purchasing Ray-Bans from Amazon.com before but of course they were sold from secondary sellers. If the glasses are sold directly from Amazon (not just fulfilled) , you are purchasing Authentic glasses so have no fear.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I think these were nice, but I lost them in a river the ...
customer_reviews.text: I think these were nice, but I lost them in a river the day after getting them. I think that catfish is looking super sporty right now
customer_reviews.author: Hikepisgah

customer_reviews.title: Truly disappointed that they cracked - I absolutely did not abuse ...
customer_reviews.text: Today, after using these sunglasses very infrequently, I noticed one lens is cracked. I am well beyond Amazon's return period and I hope that Ray-Ban or the seller can replace them or repair them. Truly disappointed that they cracked - I absolutely did not abuse them!
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Stout

customer_reviews.title: The supplier is trying to sell seconds as first rate goods.
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this product and it was delivered with a blemish on the lens. We just returned the item and received another pair and there was the same blemish on the left lens, just like the original. We are returning the sunglasses and purchasing from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise 55mm Polarized
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered 52mm Black polarized ray bans. They were far too small, I have an normal sized oval shaped head and they just looked silly, all adult males should order 55mm. Upon my returning of the black 52's which was quick and easy- I decided to go for the tortoise instead. I definitely made the right decision, they look all black but at certain angles they glimmer with brown and it just looks excellent. Very stylish and a lot cooler than going for the typical black in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: AJ McGinn

customer_reviews.title: excellent sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: you know what you're getting when you buy ray-ban! the picture is a little deceiving, in that the tortoise is not quite so apparent - it's a much darker tortoise in person that is subtle. and the "green" lenses don't look green at all, basically they're a reflective black with a small greenish tint. love them, look even better than the picture suggests.
customer_reviews.author: lpjzsum182

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sunglasses at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses at a great price. I saved considerable money by purchasing these on Amazon.com and the glasses were exactly as advertised. They were delivered on time and I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: MarkusMN

customer_reviews.title: Quality Authentic Ray Ban as described
customer_reviews.text: Quality Frames and Lenses. The sunglasses shipped quickly and arrived as described. The frames felt sturdy and well made as soon as I took them out of the case. The polarized lenses are fantastic and provide excellent protection with zero distortion. Model number matched up exactly with the Ray Ban website. That fact and the quality leave me no reservations that these are fakes. This product is a buy all day! Many compliments on this pair already.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Vandermark

customer_reviews.title: great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses, see what the hype is about for RB. I am Asian, and often have a problem finding glasses/sunglasses that fit my face. These new Wayfarer's fit me great. Don't touch the cheekbones and stay on the nose. Any of you Asians out there, pull the trigger on these.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Not like my previous Wayfarers -
customer_reviews.text: There's something wrong with the lenses that leave what you're looking at slightly out of focus and blurry. Sent them back. I have other sunglasses that don't leave me with this problem. Am a little surprised as I've always liked Ray Ban's, including Wayfarers.
customer_reviews.author: QBAL

customer_reviews.title: These are the real things!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, the real things. Was hesitant to order at first because of the low price but when received it is obvious they are real Ray-Bans. Quick shipment and no issues. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rad5030

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban New Wayfayers
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son. I'm 62 and I told him that I wore them when I was his age. He has some maui jims that he has been wearing and he likes these better. Nice price, a little late on the delivery but all in all a success. Get the polorized...........
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Lexington Ky

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are even better in person than pictured and I love the size. They are a little smaller than their previous ones and they do not slant in either. These have a much straighter fit which I like better. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Tortoise quality not expected
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a pair of wayfarers a couple of years ago, they were awesome! I got a pair in tortoise and was very disappointed. I returned and received a replacement pair from amazon and that pair was even worse! Lenses were loose, lots of creaking. Feels like it'll break just from setting it down. I've never had a bad experience before purchasing things directly from amazon, sad to say this is the first. If you're going to purchase the tortoise/polarized ones, might as well get them from sunglass hut, especially now that amazon charges tax, it'll only be about $20-30 more to get these from in store.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Ugly box, great glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Ray Ban box was damaged on one side, but glasses looked great inside their case! Fortunately they are for my son, who won't care what the packaging looks like
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth it to pay up for the polarization and sturdy quality. I have a slightly larger head than normal, and they are neither too loose nor too tight. Excellent polarization, and they have held up over the last few weeks of being at the beach/bars/sweat/sand/dropped without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Sean c

customer_reviews.title: I KNOW my sunglasses and these ARE the "real deal" I am SO happy with these and you CANNOT beat the price
customer_reviews.text: I know that some people say these are not "real" Ray-Ban Wayfarers. I KNOW my sunglasses and these ARE the "real deal" I am SO happy with these and you CANNOT beat the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: The nose area is not so smooth like all the others I have
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite first quality, I know I own a few pairs,this is the first time I bought on line,always in the store. The nose area is not so smooth like all the others I have, that's important to me comfort always. The wayfarer two fits my face better small face high cheekbones these don't fit quite the same. You always get the color case brown for brown glasses/black for black glasses, not on line I ordered brown glasses got black case,not right. So for me I think I got original ray bans for less on line, but not first quality, I won't buy them on line again.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. I was replacing a pair that had scratched lenses. Better price here than at most store. Living in California these are almost a requirement. :)
customer_reviews.author: JenJ

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Got them a day late than promised (they ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Got them a day late than promised (they were for my sister leaving on a trip next day).,, And then when I got them they were not polarized (no "P" etched in glass after Ray Ban logo). Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Anet A.

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Was a bit sceptical of origin after ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Was a bit sceptical of origin after reading some of the previous reviews, but they are exactly as advertised. Would certainly recommend and order again. Thank you very much, prompt delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Vougiouklaki

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I finally lost the New Wayfarers I've had for over 8 years. So, I took a chance, and bought these online, and I LOVE THEM! They fit and look Great!
customer_reviews.author: N. C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and are authentic Ray-Bans. They are accurately described in every way, and I'm very happy with the purchase. These tortoise shell frames are pretty dark when not on a white background (i.e. on your face), but I knew this going into the purchase. The best part is that they were $75 less than the same ones at Sunglass Hut!
customer_reviews.author: JakeW

customer_reviews.title: Deal
customer_reviews.text: Got these polarized for a bargain and there almost as new as the day I bought them, fall 13. Update: sitting at the bottom of the lake. Bet there still holding up though
customer_reviews.author: STIXY9

customer_reviews.title: great style, but loose
customer_reviews.text: I love this style- and size (55mm), but they seem stretched out. When I tried other Wayfarers on in the store, even the 55's , they still felt snug on my face.
customer_reviews.author: BCJTL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these and sad I lost them! going to have to buy again
customer_reviews.author: Loren Saintz

customer_reviews.title: love but too big
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses, definitely authentic. But will be returning for size 52 instead of 55. I am a 23 year old female with an average sized head....the 55 I could deal with but am constantly pushing back on my face and doesn't stay on the top of my head when I wear them slid up to hold my hair back. Just ordered 52, and hoping they fit. Wish they had tortoise 52 in polarized from amazon.com...instead I had to order non polarized...I will not order from 3rd party seller. I value that amazon has free shipping and Free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and size of these sunglasses. The tortoise shell is much more subtle than in the picture, which I like. Haven't had a pair of Polarized sunglasses in a long time and I forgot how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: pay-ban RB2132
customer_reviews.text: Great sun glasses and it also locks good. One thing about polarization - make sure you want polarization. It provides clear vision, at the same time it blocks certain aspects of views - like being able to see your phone screen.
customer_reviews.author: Med

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite pair of glasses. Polarized is the best way to go when it comes to sun glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Engelbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Third Pair is a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses - polarized lenses make driving in bright sunlight and glare a non-issue. I never got compliments on sunglasses before purchasing and wearing these. (I'm on my 3rd pair - no fault of the sunglasses - I lost them once, stepped on them another time ...) But, I keep coming back!
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but they are a little wide and can't be adjusted. I tired them on at Sunglass Hut (same exact style) and they fit perfectly. They also scratched really easily on the lens in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses fit my boyfriend, my sister and me. These look good on anyone, can't go wrong. The quality is exceptional and the price can't be beat on any other website; I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Want sure about the authenticity initially. After some research, I think they are real. Even if they're not, they seem to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses I've owned. Had them for a few years now. Just a classic look. Definitely get the polarized lenses, they make a big difference in vision quality.
customer_reviews.author: flatfourone

customer_reviews.title: RB2132 55mm
customer_reviews.text: The real deal. Placed an order (although some reviews claim some stock may have been compromised with 'fakes'). Thoroughly satisfied - everything is as it should be. Package included case & cleaning cloth. These replaced Wayfarers I lost 10 years ago. Cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed and skepical
customer_reviews.text: I'm not comfortable they are real Ray-Bans at all. The glasses cracked in 2nd day of use. I've owned Ray Bans for over 40 years and these were by far and away inferior to every other I've purchased. I guess people should not buy personal items of any value online. It's a shame AMAZON.COM makes it so difficult to provide feedback or ask questions with no easy access to an 800 number.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dubya

customer_reviews.title: Great price for awesome sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love WayFarer RayBans. They are my go to, and these are no exception. Last forever, and the polarized lenses are great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blonski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I order my Ray-Ban RB2132 New Wayfarer Sunglasses,55 mm,TORTOISE with the one day shipping they came in on time and everything, even before the expected date! People are saying they are getting fakes? Mine aren't, maybe if you buy it from the new and used area that other people are selling them them yes they will most likely be fake! But overall my experience with these and amazon have been awesome! Also I'd recommend going with the 55mm glasses! I'm a teenager and these are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sun glasses, my main pair! I got fast delivery and they fit fine. I would recommend this seller, and product highly
customer_reviews.author: Kool Breeze

customer_reviews.title: 55mm shades
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of shades. The size I received was 55mm but it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great (and Authentic) Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: After reading what the other two reviewers had written, I was very reluctant on buying these glasses because of issues with authenticity. However, I took the chance and went ahead and purchased them since the price was great and there was free shipping/free returns. Amazon isn't known to sell fake items but I took them into a store for authentication anyway, and was reassured that they are, in fact, the real thing. Everything checked out and they are GREAT sunglasses! If you're looking for a pair of polarized Wayfarers for a good price, I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: SCHWEET!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are so good that even Donald Trump sports them. That's HUGE!!!!! And polarized lenses to boot.
customer_reviews.author: El Guapo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What else can you say ??? They are Ray-Bans and these sunglasses live up to the name.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Smith

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to my Mother-In-Law and she loves them! The Wayfarer is such a classic style of sunglasses and they are made so well you can keep them forever. For Polarized Ray-Ban sunglasses you cannot beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Actually improved a classic
customer_reviews.text: These are very, very nice. They look great as Wayfarers should. The angle is more comfortable than the originals. The polarized lenses are A-1.
customer_reviews.author: General28

customer_reviews.title: These glasses were polarized when I bought them, however ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were polarized when I bought them, however a few months later the coating came off and you can actually see the cracks on the lense as it was coming off. I don't think they're genuine RayBans, and the return window has lapsed so I am stuck with a piece of junk. I am very surprised at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and classic
customer_reviews.text: These new version of the classic Wayfarer glasses are perfect. I love the way they fit and feel. The quality is great and they retain that classic look. Great sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel_gear_geek

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased my Way Farers from Amazon after losing mine. Received it 3 days and I like to report that this product is a genuine, high quality Ray Ban and not a fake for $50 less than sunglass hut. Glad I made the purchase, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: Great style!
customer_reviews.text: I beleive these are authentic RayBans and they are the original classic "Wayfairer" style that looks great on anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these new glasses
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these new glasses.. I have been using a lot of brands lately but my 1st choice will be these. What better I got it as a gift from my girl.. And I presented one her back as her birthday gift.. We both love these pairs. Fits perfectly and glares are long forgotten.. Look out for deals as these are on offer time and again.. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you receive the size you ordered
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. however ordered 52mm and just received 55mm! WAY too big!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ImagineLor

customer_reviews.title: NOT Polarized.
customer_reviews.text: Shocked that they can get away with selling a product with false advertising in the product description. "Polarized" sunglasses were not polarized, however they did look authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Years ago I owned a pair made by Bausch & ...
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I owned a pair made by Bausch & Lomb. They had glass lenses and were a bit sturdier. Still, these appear to be well made and the style is classic. Price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Dasha's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Love the polarized lenses.
customer_reviews.text: I got these in Tortoise with Crystal Green polarized lenses. They are the same quality and polarization as my much more expensive Persols. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: frequent user

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a birthday gift for my sister and she loves them. Product was exactly as ordered and came early the next morning (paid for one day delivery).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Son had bought this product seven years ago and refused to discard them even though scratched and worn. He loves the new set even more because the lenses are polarized.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Karns

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money for polarized, your eyes will thank you. The sunglasses were exactly what I ordered and feel great. The lenses are clear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the description. Real polarized Ray Ban Wayfarers. I wish they made them in wider sizes, but these work okay for my big head, and I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: They are Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: Great looking glasses. Fit pretty good. Just slightly wide for my head and will not stay on top of my head when I push them up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lenses dirty and smudged
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that I have to order again elsewhere. Will order straight from manufacturer this time--$24 savings NOT worth dirty glasses straight out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Jack O.

customer_reviews.title: ... and have a hard time find sunglasses that I like and that look good
customer_reviews.text: I have a round larger face and have a hard time find sunglasses that I like and that look good. These fit the bill! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a GREAT pair of glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a GREAT pair of glasses....Love the way they look and how the world looks thru them.....now if I only looked better...
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rottie Guy

customer_reviews.title: Ray-Bab
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! What else do I need to say? If your eyes are sensitive to light these are the sunglasses for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these in the store and found them on Amazon for about $50 cheaper. They arrived in a flash, however, the initial pair I ordered had a small defect. I reordered them and the second pair was perfect. Love the ease of Amazon prime returns! The sunglasses are great and I am glad I got the polarized ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dmac

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I will never buy another pair of non-polarized sunglasses again!
customer_reviews.author: Ckip

customer_reviews.title: very confortable and fit perfect. my wife loves
customer_reviews.text: this is for my wife, very confortable and fit perfect. my wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kun Ouyang

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban RB2132 New Wayfarer Mirrored Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
Ray-Ban RB2132 New Wayfarer sunglasses take the iconic shape of the Classic Wayfarer and infuse a slightly smaller frame and softer eye shape perfect for women and men. These unisex sunglasses are non-polarized. All Ray-Ban sunglasses are made from superior materials, and these unisex flash mirrored sunglasses are no exception. RB2132 unisex Wayfarer frames are manufactured from durable nylon, making them lightweight and able to hold up against frequent use. Our Wayfarer sunglasses feature flash mirror lenses, which are prescription ready and made from glass.

Ray-Ban allows you to choose from a variety of flash mirrored lens colors including blue, green, orange or silver. All Ray-Ban New Wayfarer Classic sunglasses are designed to offer an easy fit with a high level of visual clarity and protection. The sunglasses are available in a variety of size options to ensure a relaxed yet comfortable fit. Our glass lenses help protect your eyes against harmful UV rays and have been coated with 100% UV protection. Ray-Ban glasses are comprised of precision-cut lenses that reduce eye strain when worn.

Ray-Ban unisex sunglasses are comfortable and effective to wear on cloudy and hazy days, when the sun is bright, and during sunrise and sunset. 



Ray-Ban is the world's most iconic eyewear brand and is a global leader in its sector. Every model in the Ray-Ban collection is the product of meticulous, original styling that translates the best of the latest fashion trends into an ever-contemporary look for millions of Ray-Ban wearers around the world. From the early Aviator style that emerged in 1937 to the introduction of the classic Wayfarer in 1952, Ray-Ban is a brand that embodies America and adventure, great cities and wide-open spaces, heroism, individuality, and authenticity. Starting with a silver screen debut in 1961, Ray-Ban sunglasses have appeared throughout hundreds of films and have been a favorite on the Hollywood scene for years, both on and off the screen. With timeless and imaginative styles, Ray-Ban consistently blends high-tech design, lenses, and materials. The collection remains true to its classic heritage while continuously evolving to meet today's fashion demands.
feature_bullets: Clean lenses with the lens cloth and keep in case.
100% UV PROTECTION: To protect your eyes from harmful UV rays, these New Wayfarer sunglasses are polarized and coated with 100% UV protection. The 55 mm x 41 mm lenses are durable and polarized.

POLARIZED SUNGLASSES: The Ray-Ban New Wayfarer sunglasses feature the legendary Ray-Ban polarized lenses that improve clarity and contrast, while reducing glare and eye-strain. Made from high-quality scratch-resistant glass.

UNISEX RAY-BAN SUNGLASSES: The classic Ray-Ban Wayfarer is a fashionable, comfortable, and strong pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses made for both men and women. The combination of the durable plastic frame with crystal green glass lenses is legendary.

DURABLE ACETATE FRAMES: Ray-Ban unisex polarized sunglasses are exceptionally durable. The frame is made from lightweight and strong acetate. The bridge measures 18 mm, and the arms are 145 mm for an easy, comfortable fit.
MULTIPLE SIZE OPTIONS: Choose from a variety of size options including 52mm, 55mm or 58mm.
CASE & LENS CLOTH INCLUDED: Each pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses come with a case and lens cloth to clean and protect them from scratches and damage.
VISIT THE RAY-BAN BRAND SHOP: Click on the Ray-Ban logo above to view the entire Ray-Ban brand assortment.
